name: SERA COFFEE TRAY / TATAKAN GELAS / NAMPAN KAYU - SERA COFFEE
description: Sera coffee tray will never let you spill your coffee. Made using mahogany wood and finished with beeswax food-grade. This coffee tray boast natural colors that is brought out by the wax. Serve your coffee and afternoon dessert with this coffee tray, nothing will go wrong, we guarantee it. Have we mentioned, that you can also engrave this tray with a personal text or logo?

name: PEKAT CUP / GELAS KERAMIK / CANGKIR KOPI - PEKAT CERULEAN (BLUE)
description: Have a sip or two, and let the dose of caffeine boost you up. Have a blast with this elegant and high quality ceramic glass, thoughtfully crafted with love to turn every coffee session into a whole new magical experience! The best way to keep the blues away, especially on a Monday morning

name: MORI SPOON / SENDOK BUMBU KECIL KAYU / SENDOK TAKAR - MORI SPOON
description: Your plastic measuring spoons become discolored or damaged because they can't stand the heat? Oh no! Let’s replace it with Mori Spoon ! One set comes in various sizes that can be used as you needed. Measuring spices, facial mask powder, and measuring ingredients for cakes as well! Cool!

name: CIEL CUTTING BOARD / SERVING BOARD / TATAKAN KAYU / TALENAN SAJI KAYU - CIEL
description: Ciel is a unique serving board. It is passionately crafted by local craftsman then it is finished with food-grade wax so that it will be safe when comes into direct contact with food. What would you like to cook for dinner today? Steak? Burger? This will be the right serving board for you.

name: KERANJANG RATTAN 1 SET / KERANJANG ANYAMAN ROTAN + TOPLES - KERANJANG RATTAN
description: Sebuah tempat penyimpanan keranjang rattan yang dapat digunakan sebagai tempat penyimpanan pernak-pernik rumah, dekorasi atau makanan.

name: RUNA SERVING BOARD / TATAKAN KAYU JATI / TALENAN KAYU - RUNA
description: Just like a painter who uses a palette for painting, a chef must have a chopping board in their arsenal. The Runa Serving Board uses teak as the base material and its and don’t worry about the quality, food grade is always guaranteed!

name: TUDUNG SAJI VANA / TUDUNG SAJI BAMBU / PENUTUP WADAH SAJI - VANA
description: The new variants of food cover have just arrived in Dekornata! This time it’s made from bamboo that we know is strongly durable. What makes it special is that it's handmade by one of our talented craftsmen. Best quality guaranteed!

name: WOODEN COASTER / ALAS GELAS / ALAS CANGKIR / TATAKAN GELAS KAYU - FOOD-GRADE BEESWAX
description: The OG classic wooden coaster. This is Dekornata's first product, we love this as it is historical for us. We love to share it with you. It is made out of solid mahogany branch that is sliced to produce a rustic coaster. This coaster still has its original bark that makes it unique and definitely functional because it will protect your surfaces from the temperature changes of beverages or movements.

name: CUBI BAMBOO TRAY / KOTAK PENYIMPANAN SERBAGUNA / NAMPAN BAMBU - CUBI BAMBOO
description: Can you imagine displaying your favorite things on this attractive bamboo tray? This pretty weave craft made dearly by our craftsmen, will surely make your room as aesthetic as ever!

name: TOBI FLOWER VASE / VAS BUNGA KAYU - TOBI NATURAL
description: Now, this is one simple vase that can’t be overlooked. Tobi is a simple yet classy vase, crafted out of wood. This vase will sit subtly, nicely blending in with whatever decoration you have. It literally fits perfectly anywhere!

name: NATURAL HEXAGON WOODEN TRAY / TATAKAN KAYU / NAMPAN KAYU - NATURAL HEXAGON TRAY
description: A hexagon tray. Nuff said. Let the product speak for itself. It is made out of solid mahogany wood.

name: RECTANGULAR TISSUE BOX / TISU BOX KAYU / TEMPAT TISU / KOTAK TISU KAYU - WALNUT RECTANGULAR TISSUE BOX
description: A minimalist and simple tissue box. Made out of solid mahogany wood, it's especially designed to look attractive and elegant.
